name: Glue Bot Galaxy
description:
• WASD = Move
  • R-Click =  Zoom in to shoot
  • L-Click = Shoot while zoomed in
  • SPACEBAR  = Jump

Take control of the mighty Glue-Bot to temporarily stick planets back together long enough to safely evacuate. Look out for spewing lava and cracks and spray accordingly to stall the threat of an inevitable explosion.

Changelog (4/4/22 8:58pm)

  • Fixed player being able to ADS during end level scene
  • Fixed "death" state (falling to the planet core should have triggered to end the level)
